about_the_game:
Project: Pest Control is a single-play first-person shooter where you take on the role of a mech pilot on a mission to reclaim an orbital facility overrun by alien infestation. Set in a retro-futuristic space station, the game combines intense combat, strategic upgrades, and a visually striking environment to deliver a thrilling experience.

Key Features

  • Mech Combat: You are controlling a big mech suit with a massive mini-gun to mow dow waves of relentless aliens. Experience adrenaline-fueled action with satisfying gunplay and explosive effects.

  • Mech Customization: Gather resources and upgrade the abilities that your mech has. Tailor your playstyle to dominate the battlefield.

  • Retro-Futuristic Aesthetic: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning environment inspired by retro-futuristic sci-fi designs. From the sleek corridors of the station to the eerie glow of alien nests - every detail enhances the atmosphere.

  • Challenging Enemy Types: Face different alien threats, each one with unique behaviours. Strategize you approach to overcome every threat you face!

About the Development Team

Developed by third-year students at Breda University of Applied Sciences, Project: Pest Control delivers intense action, strategic mech customization, and a uniquely stylized space environment for an unforgettable gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Graphic violence such as exploding of aliens.

name: Project: Pest Control

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 @2.60 GHz or higher / AMD Ryzen 5 @3.00 GH or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 4GB VRAM or equivalen
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 @2.60 GHz or higher / AMD Ryzen 5 @3.00 GH or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 6GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: In Project: Pest Control equip a powerful mech suit and a massive mini-gun to annihiliate alien infestations. Tear through hoards, enhance your mech, and reclaim the orbital station. A single-player FPS made by third year students at Breda University of Applied Sciences.
